name: Walter Payton Jersey
description: I've had this jersey for the past 15 years and it's still in good condition. The Bears have really disappointed me the past decade so I have to part ways. It might be a supersticious thing but I'm willing to part ways with it.

name: Bears Hats
description: I have a bunch of new Bears hats that I want to sell at a discounted price. Buy as many as you want since there are a lot of them.
